definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Nodal NK-cell lymphoma are quite rare.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴結中，NK細胞淋巴瘤很少。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore CT features and diagnostic value of castleman disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討巨淋巴結增生症的CT表現及診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To identify intraoperatively the feasibility of lymphatic mapping with methylene.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究亞甲藍術中定位胃癌前哨淋巴結的可行性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate an effective method for detecting lymphatic micrometastasis in gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討檢測胃癌淋巴結微轉移的有效方法。

sentences.english: Large lymph node swellings must be drained.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴結腫大很可能消除。

sentences.english: Indirect sign including carotid lymphnode enlargement was found.
sentences.chinese: 同時可發現頸淋巴結腫大徵象。

sentences.english: They could also have enlarged lymph nodes, lethargy and vertigo.
sentences.chinese: 他們還可能有淋巴結腫大，嗜睡和眩暈等症狀。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the D-limonene on the clinical impact of lymph node breast cancer and research.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討右旋檸烯對乳腺癌淋巴結轉移的影響。

sentences.english: Did cheeper get mesentery lymph node how cure?
sentences.chinese: 幼兒得了腸繫膜淋巴結怎麼醫治呢？

sentences.english: Unilateral inguinal lymphadenopathy is usually a response to infection of an ipsilateral lower extremity.
sentences.chinese: 單側腹股溝區淋巴結腫大常是單側下肢感染的反應。

sentences.english: Do not have lymph node and liver splenomegaly commonly.
sentences.chinese: 一般無淋巴結及肝脾腫大。

sentences.english: Of inguinal lymph node enlargement medication control method?
sentences.chinese: 腹股溝淋巴結腫大的藥物治療控制方法？

sentences.english: Neck dissection may not be practiced until neck lymph node is positive.
sentences.chinese: 對頸淋巴結未及腫大的患者可暫不行頸淋巴結清掃術。

sentences.english: Neck dissection may not be practiced until neck lymph node is positive.
sentences.chinese: 對頸淋巴結未及腫大的患者可暫不行頸淋巴結清掃術。

sentences.english: There were few primary lymph nodules which devoid of germinal centre in the lymph nodes.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴結已形成極少數不具生髮中心的初級淋巴小結。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical diagnosis of mesenteric lymphadenitis by high frequency ultrasonography.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高頻超聲對小兒腸繫膜淋巴結炎的臨牀診斷。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
